privacy.general_information_text: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit our website. Personal data is all data with which you can be personally identified. You can find detailed information on the subject of data protection in our data protection declaration listed under this text.
privacy.responsible_for_data_collection: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
privacy.data_processing: The data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find his contact details in the imprint of this website.
privacy.how_we_collect_data: How do we collect your data?
privacy.data_communication: On the one hand, your data is collected when you communicate it to us. This may, for example, be data that you enter in a contact form.
privacy.technical_data: Other data is automatically recorded by our IT systems when you visit the website. This is primarily technical data (e.g. Internet browser, operating system or time of page access). This data is recorded automatically as soon as you enter our website.
privacy.operators_take_protection: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this data protection declaration.
privacy.responsible_body_info: The responsible body for data processing on this website is: Praktiga Consulting GmbH, Southern Munich Street 62, 82031 Grünwald, Germany. Responsible: Yavuz Gürcan.
privacy.revocation_of_consent: Revocation of your consent to data processing
privacy.revocation_info: Many data processing operations are only possible with your express consent. You can revoke your consent at any time. All you need to do is send us an informal email. The legality of the data processing carried out up to the time of revocation remains unaffected by the revocation.
privacy.right_to_lodge_complaint: Right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority
privacy.complaint_info: In the event of violations of data protection law, the person affected has the right to lodge a complaint with the responsible supervisory authority. The responsible supervisory authority for data protection issues is the state data protection officer of the federal state in which our company is based.
privacy.portability_info: You have the right to have data that we process automatically on the basis of your consent or in fulfillment of a contract handed over to you or to a third party in a common, machine-readable format. If you request that the data be transferred directly to another responsible party, this will only be done if it is technically feasible.
privacy.encryption_info: For security reasons and to protect the transmission of confidential content, such as orders or enquiries that you send to us as the site operator, this site uses SSL or TLS encryption. You can recognize an encrypted connection by the fact that the address line of the browser changes from "http://" to "https://" and by the lock symbol in your browser line.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We are proud to work with some of the most innovative companies in the field of IAM.

Omada.description: Omada is a market-leading provider of IT security solutions and services for Identity Management and Access Governance.
Omada.content1: Omada enables organizations to achieve sustainable compliance, reduce risk exposure, and maximize automation. Omada’s solutions efficiently manage and control users’ access rights to applications and data - reducing IT costs and resource intensive administration processes.
Omada.content2: Established in 2000, Omada has operations globally, delivering solutions directly and via a network of skilled partners and system integrators. Omada is recognized as a trusted advisor and has provided advanced identity management solutions for organizations with some of the largest and most complex IT infrastructures in the world.

EmpowerID.description: EmpowerID is the award-winning, All-In-One Identity Management and Cloud Security Suite
EmpowerID.content1: With over two decades of experience in the industry, EmpowerID offers a highly scalable and customizable infrastructure designed to meet the complex needs of organizations across various sectors. The platform enables enterprises to manage millions of identities globally, providing essential services such as user provisioning, single sign-on (SSO), access governance, and robust audit controls.
EmpowerID.content2: The company is committed to a Zero Trust security model, focusing on secure access to both cloud and on-premise applications. EmpowerID's solutions address the evolving challenges of cybersecurity, enabling organizations to manage privileged accounts and streamline security processes effectively. With notable clients like Siemens, Airbus, and Deloitte, EmpowerID has established itself as a trusted partner in identity management, helping businesses reduce costs and improve their security posture in today’s complex digital landscape.

memberships.title: Our Memberships
memberships.description: Praktiga Consulting is a proud member of the following associations:

SNM.title: Security Network Munich
SNM.description: The Security Network Munich is an association of companies and research institutions in the greater Munich area.
SNM.content: The Security Network Munich is an association of companies and research institutions in the greater Munich area. Launched seven years ago as a funded project of the Bavarian Ministry of Economic Affairs, the non-profit association “Sicherheitsnetzwerk München e.V.” was founded in January 2019. The aim of the association is to increase awareness and expertise on the topic of IT security, to promote the protection of companies and the public against cyber risks, and to make a concrete contribution to promoting innovation and excellence in the field of IT security. The networking of all relevant stakeholders is of central importance to the Security Network Munich. Members are therefore both providers and users of IT security solutions, large corporations have joined as well as medium-sized businesses. Research institutions are also part of the association.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: At Praktiga Consulting, we understand that information security is crucial in today's digital landscape. Our commitment to protecting sensitive data and maintaining the highest standards of security is reflected in our comprehensive Information Security Policy.

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.content: We are committed to ensuring the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of all information we handle. This commitment extends to our clients' data, our employees' information, and all business-related data that passes through our systems.

certification.title: ISO 27001 Certification
certification.content: Our ISO/IEC 27001:2013 certification demonstrates our dedication to maintaining the highest standards of information security management. This internationally recognized certification validates our systematic approach to managing sensitive company and customer information.
